text.content: She lives on Love Street  Lingers long on Love Street  She has a house and garden  I would like to see what happens  She has robes and she has monkeys  Lazy diamond studded flunkies    She has wisdom and knows what to do  She has me and she has you  She has wisdom and knows what to do  She has me and she has you    I see you live on Love Street  There's this store where the creatures meet  I wonder what they do in there  Summer Sunday and a year    I guess I like it fine, so far  She lives on Love Street  Lingers long on Love Street  She has a house and garden  I would like to see what happens    La, la, la, la, la, la, la, La, la, la, la, la, la, la  La, la, la, la, la, la, la, La, la, la, la, la, la, la
